name: Educational Demonstration Model (KLASS-inspired structure)
description: Illustrative logistic regression model for teaching computational risk assessment. NOT clinically validated. Coefficients are pedagogical approximations inspired by published KLASS trial stage stratification patterns, not derived from formal model training.
citation: Demonstration model by M.H. Dressler (2025). Structure inspired by: (1) Kim W, et al. Lancet. 2019;393(10178):1244-1253 (KLASS-02 trial); (2) Hyung WJ, et al. JAMA Surg. 2021;156(7):655-663 (KLASS risk patterns). NOT a reproduction of any published prediction model.
development_status: Uncalibrated educational tool - not for clinical use
